room_title: Escape room "The Speakeasy" by Xscape The Room in Philadelphia
review: We BARELY escaped - one minute 36 seconds to go! What a great afternoon spent with family! Xscape the Room (Speakeasy) was just a fun, challenging and engaging experience regardless of the age. Had a great time! Gong back when the kids all come back for Thanksgiving! Can't wait!

room_title: Escape room "The Speakeasy" by Xscape The Room in Philadelphia
review: This is the second year that my work did a team building escape room, and once again, we had an awesome time! We were lucky enough to escape the Speakeasy (and Bugsy's wrath). The room was very well put together, and it was challenging, but not to the point where you were so overwhelmed that you wanted to give up.We can't wait to do it again next year!

room_title: Escape room "The Speakeasy" by Xscape The Room in Philadelphia
review: We had a blast in the Speakeasy room! Got out with 3 minutes to spare. We will certainly take another trip to Media real soon!
